title: Bio-Ward Breach
description: The Harbinger has realized the surface is too strong. It is physically expanding the Bio-Ward downwards, chewing into the city's bedrock to build a massive incubation chamber.

turns.narrative: Captain Aldric leads a small squad of Warden elites into the breach. The tunnels are lined with acidic slime that melts through standard armor.
turns.choice_a: Take point using your high agility
turns.consequence_a: You navigate safely, guiding the squad. Everyone survives the descent.
turns.consequence_b: Several troopers fall into acid traps, dissolving instantly. Aldric loses half his squad before you reach the bottom.

turns.narrative: At the bottom, you find three massive incubation sacs. They are ready to burst with Harbinger Clones.
turns.choice_a: Throw high-explosives at all three indiscriminately
turns.consequence_a: A massive detonation destroys two sacs, but ruptures the third, spilling a fully grown nightmare clone.
turns.choice_b: Carefully plant shaped charges on their neuro-stems
turns.consequence_b: A precise explosion vaporizes all three sacs cleanly, but you take significant toxic backlash during the planting.

perfect_breach.description: You breached the chamber without squad casualties.

messy_breach.description: You breached the chamber, but Aldric's men died in the acid.

conclusion: You breached the chamber without squad casualties.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
